info.name: Firefox OS X El Capitan
info.description: Theme with a better OS X El Capitan UI integration. Important The theme doesn't display properly with Stylish. Try it using the userchrome file instead.
info.additionalInfo:
• This theme was written only for OS X.
  • Not tested on retina Macs.
  • El Capitan's Safari 9 look alike.
Installation: 1. Go to about:config and change browser.tabs.animate value to false (avoid blank spaces after closing tabs) 2. Place buttons images in your chrome folder. Download link 3. Uncomment next elements background or list-style-image attributes: #back-button .toolbarbutton-icon #forward-button .toolbarbutton-icon #TabsToolbar .tabs-newtab-button #TabsToolbar #new-tab-button #TabsToolbar .tabs-newtab-button:hover, #TabsToolbar #new-tab-button:hover #TabsToolbar .tabs-newtab-button:-moz-window-inactive, #TabsToolbar #new-tab-button:-moz-window-inactive #TabsToolbar .scrollbutton-up #TabsToolbar .scrollbutton-down #TabsToolbar .scrollbutton-up:-moz-window-inactive #TabsToolbar .scrollbutton-down:-moz-window-inactive #TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab:hover .tab-close-button .toolbarbutton-icon Version updates: 1.1 | Position of sound tab indicator was fixed.
